name: Trashinator
description:
Welcome, Welcome, Step Right Up to our lovely oceans. But there are litterers trying to dump trash in the oceans and wreak havoc in our #TeamSeas Clubhouse.

As our new Trashinator. Your goal is to shoot the trash and the people who dump it. It should be simple and fun, also please don't shoot innocents, we don't want to get shut down.

This game was made for the #SeaJam. https://itch.io/jam/seajam

Also, You too can be a Trashinator in real life, if you have a dollar or more to spare. Make sure to donate to TeamSeas: https://teamseas.org

Music:

Game, Title,  And Instructions Music comes from The Charm Of The Old Music Box on Early 1960's, Hacker Music Box LP.

Danger Music comes 1810 Circus Pipe Organ By Sound Ideas.
